::Savanna:: 

A stasis pod falls to the planet.  The pod lands in Africa.  The 
scanners scan an animal form and transform the bot inside.  The pod 
opens and out steps the lioness. 


Enter Savanna 


Name: Savanna 
Alegeiance: Maximal 
Function: Recon Scout/Hunter/Chief Security Officer 

Beast Mode: Lioness 

Robot appearance: Female, Matt-Tan steel (not shiney) 

STATS: 

Strength: 9 
Intelligence: 7 
Speed: 9 
Endurance: 8 
Rank: 3 
Courage: 9 
Firepower: 6 
Skill: 8 

Prolouge:  A pride hunter.  Hunts with partners or alone. Was sent to 
Future Earth on a recon mission but ship was lost in a worm hole and 
thrown back into time.  She is now on Past Earth. Was originally the 
head of security for her ship and now alone on the African plains. 
She wishes to find a pride to join. She is currently living with a 
pride of real lions on the African plains


Weapons: 
1 heat lazar sheathed in right forearm 
1 heat saber 
1 small cross bow with ion bolts
Tirkanium teeth and claws 
One small cloaking devise
